leadership.name: Sean Balakhanei
leadership.biography: Sean Balakhanei is the head of the NYU Blockchain and Fintech Development Team. Currently a 3rd year computer science student at NYU Tandon with minors in Math and Finance. Works at Group One Trading as a Trading Analyst Intern, and is an upcoming Software Engineering Intern at Amazon.

leadership.name: Charles Chung
leadership.biography: Charles Chung is the Development Coordinator at NYU Blockchain and Fintech's Development Team. Having previous experience at Polgyon Labs, BitMart, and Empire Group Holdings Limited, Charles is studying Economics at NYU CAS in conjunction with a CAS minor.

leadership.name: Shreyaas Sureshbabu
leadership.biography: Shreyaas Sureshbabu is a Sophomore at NYU Stern studying Finance and Computer Science. Previously interened at Commvault. Procures and resells archive fashion clothes in spare time.

leadership.name: Vishakh Sandwar
leadership.biography: Vishakh is a first-year at NYU studying Finance and Math with a minor in CS from Charlotte, NC. He's previously interned at Kaleido and StandardDAO and is an ex-member of the NYU B&F Case team, and the creator of this website! While not coding, he's running, playing poker and crying about the Charlotte Hornets.

leadership.name: Varun Aravapalli
leadership.biography: Varun is a junior at NYU Tandon majoring in Computer Science with minors in Math and Data Science. He's previously interned as a Data Science intern at Amnesia Media and Numina, and is an incoming SWE intern at Barclays.

leadership.name: Yan Luo
leadership.biography: Yan Luo is a junior at NYU Stern studying Actuarial Science and Finance with a double major in Computer Science at CAS. She has previously worked as an actuarial and IT intern and is an incoming Risk Management summer analyst at Goldman Sachs. During her free time, she enjoys art, baking, and kickboxing!

leadership.name: Sebastien Fousse
leadership.role: Web Development Team/NFT Development Team Member
leadership.biography: Sebastien is a 3rd year Computer Science student at NYU Tandon. Previous experience at Tictrac and preparing for a SWE internship at TD Securities. Outside of school, Seb has an interest psychology, rock climbing, and generative artwork.

leadership.name: Anish Palvai
leadership.biography: Freshman studying Math and Computer Science interested in DeFi, trading, and research. In his free time he enjoys running, watching soccer, and traveling.

leadership.name: Ishaan Poojari
leadership.biography: Ishaan is a first year student at NYU Tandon studying Computer Science. He is intersted in disruptive technologies such as blockchain and machine learning. Previously interned as a reinforcement learning developer at the Johns Hopkins Applied Physcis Laboratory and currently works as a computer vision intern for a robotics startup called Orangewood Labs.

leadership.name: James Chen
leadership.biography: James Chen is a sophomore studying computer science and data science at NYU.
